mapper.select: SELECT USERID, USERNAME, EMAIL, UPOINT, TO_CHAR(INDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS INDATE FROM TUSER ORDER BY USERID ASC

SELECT USERID, PASSWD, USERNAME, EMAIL, CASE WHEN UPOINT BETWEEN 8001 AND 10000 THEN 'VIP' WHEN UPOINT BETWEEN 6001 AND 8000 THEN '우수' WHEN UPOINT BETWEEN 4001 AND 6000 THEN '일반' WHEN UPOINT BETWEEN 2001 AND 4000 THEN '준회원' WHEN UPOINT BETWEEN 0 AND 2000 THEN '손님' END AS UPT, UPOINT, TO_CHAR(INDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS INDATE FROM TUSER ORDER BY USERID ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TUSER ( USERID, PASSWD, USERNAME, EMAIL) VALUES ( #{ userid }, #{ passwd }, #{ username }, #{ email } )
